price: Kuma da Mun so, haƙĩƙa dã Mun aika da mai gargaɗi* a ciƙin kõwace alƙarya.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
footnotes: * Dã Muna so dã Mun aika wa kõwane gari da Annabinsa mai yi musu gargaɗi, amma ba Mu so haka ba, sai Muka aika ka kai ɗaya zuwa ga dukan dũniya dõmin Mu ɗaukaka darajarka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
